not_finded_information_block.title: Didn't Find What You Were Looking For?

faqItems.question: What is web hosting?
faqItems.answerDescription: This service allows you to host your website on a reliable platform. The main goal of web hosting is to support your website's operation with sufficient resources at an affordable cost.

faqItems.question: How can I interact with the purchased service?
faqItems.answerTitle: How can I interact with the purchased service?
faqItems.answerDescription: After activation, you'll receive login details for your account. From there, you can configure built-in software, add SSL certificates, set up email domains, and more. You'll also receive full FTP access to upload files to the remote server.

faqItems.question: Can I use a domain name for my website?
faqItems.answerTitle: Can I use a domain name for my website?
faqItems.answerDescription: Absolutely! Along with the service, you'll receive a free subdomain from our company to link to your website. You can also link your own domain name if desired.

faqItems.question: What software is supported on web hosting?
faqItems.answerTitle: What software is supported on web hosting?
faqItems.answerDescription:
Interaction takes place through the ISPmanager Lite control panel. Supported software includes:
* Web Server: Apache ITK/Prefork, Nginx, PHP-FPM, PHP for Apache, Awstats, Webalizer, Logrotate
* Mail Server: Exim, Dovecot, Greylisting, OpenDKIM, SpamAssassin, ClamAv, Sieve, AfterLogic, RoundCube
* DNS Server: Bind/PowerDNS
* FTP Server: ProFTPD/PureFTP
* Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL

faqItems.question: Is there a trial period?
faqItems.answerDescription: Our company offers a trial period for both regular and corporate customers.

support_block.title: Online Support Chat
support_block.description: Have questions? Write to us in the chat! Support available 24/7
